title: Account level stuck at 5
body: Even though I've been level 30 for I don't even know how long, my level on here is stuck at 5 and I can't post in any other boards except the basic ones like support and behavior.

replies.body: It looks like you're showing up as 30 now!  Sometimes an account will need to sync to the boards, and it looks like your post here has done just that.  Happy posting.  :D
